comments.creator: roc@ocallahan.org
comments.author: roc@ocallahan.org
comments.raw_text: It's basically saying "on mobile we care more about performance than avoiding a few sampling artifacts".
comments.text: It's basically saying "on mobile we care more about performance than avoiding a few sampling artifacts".

comments.raw_text: I don't think mobile is a good indication for that. (Some) modern smart phones have quite substantial horsepower. I we really want to take shortcuts we should gate that on some throughput measurement. I really would like to get consistent rendering on mobile and desktop. At most lets make this a switch (if its a huge perf win, users with low end desktops or netbooks might care too).
comments.text: I don't think mobile is a good indication for that. (Some) modern smart phones have quite substantial horsepower.
